h2_title: Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Second Bell
content: Once you’re done chatting with the Shen Monkey, be sure to look near the wooden scaffolding ledge by a large statue, and absorb a green wisp spirit to earn a bunch of Will. You can drop down below for a shortcut down the main path along with a Snake-Head Mushroom, but there’s one more thing to grab outside first.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bamboo_Grove_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bamboo Grove Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Second Bell' and the sub-subsection 'Marsh of the White Mist'.
The content is as follows:
Once you’re done chatting with the Shen Monkey, be sure to look near the wooden scaffolding ledge by a large statue, and absorb a green wisp spirit to earn a bunch of Will. You can drop down below for a shortcut down the main path along with a Snake-Head Mushroom, but there’s one more thing to grab outside first.
